file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 06-41-03-01 - COCKPIT INTERNAL PANELS - COMPONENT LOCATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL COCKPIT INTERNAL PANELS - COMPONENT LOCATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the location of the internal panels of major zone 200 in the cockpit. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 06-41-03 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL COCKPIT INTERNAL PANELS - COMPONENT LOCATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. List of the Equipment and Components A. Table 101 gives the equipment and components to which you can get access through the cockpit internal panels. Table 101 - MAJOR ZONE 200 - COCKPIT PANEL IDENTIFICATION NUMBER EQUIPMENT/COMPONENTS LEFT RIGHT 223AZ (Figure 101) Glareshield panel 223BZ (Figure 101) Main instrument panel 223CLW (Figure 101) Conditioned air hose Conditioned air hose, Electrical wiring, Micro- 223DLW (Figure 101) switch for aircraft with side-hinged main door LH auxiliary relay support, Generator control 223ELW (Figure 101) units 1 and 3 Steering connector, TAT 1 connector, Quick- 223FLW (Figure 101) donning oxygen mask hose, Oxygen distribu- tion tube, Conditioned air hose 223GZ (Figure 101) Pitot lines 223HZ (Figure 101) Rudder control mechanism 223IZ (Figure 101) Control pedestal APU Fire control module, Engine 1 Fire control 223JLW (Figure 101) module, Windshield temperature controller 1 GPWS, AOA, Ice detector 1, APU fire control 223KLW (Figure 101) module, Engine 1 fire control module 223LZ (Figure 101) Maintenance panel W101-to-W745 interface connectors, left power 223MZ (Figure 101) control and distribution box 223NZ (Figure 102) Thrust lever resolver Thrust lever resolver, Electrical connector of 223OZ (Figure 102) speed brake 223PZ (Figure 102) Inverter of floodlight 223QZ (Figure 102) Inverter of floodlight Electrical connectors of thrust lever, Micro- 223RZ (Figure 102) switch set cylinder, Electrical connectors of mi- croswitches Electrical connectors of thrust lever, Micro- 223SZ (Figure 102) switch set cylinder, Electrical connectors of mi- croswitches Reference pressure tube connection, Vacuum 223TZ (Figure 102) tube connection EMB-145 - AMM 1285 PGBLK 100 06-41-03 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A.
